content: half_double_crochet 3 double_crochet in one loop turn around 1 single_crochet fasten_off leave a long yarn to sew ear 2 using beige 1 chain 7 start from 2nd chain from hook 3 double_crochet in one loop 1 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet 3 slip_stitch fasten_off leave a long yarn to sew designer tatyana bocharova @tanyaasmile finishing sew the hair to the head sew the arms between 27-28 row sew the ears to the head embroider eyebrows above eyes embroider emblem on shirt you are done congratulations don t forget to share pictures of your creations and tag me on instagram @tanyaasmile i am really looking forward to see your dolls more of my crochet patterns https //www etsy com/shop/shopforthepatterns section_id=53313125 designer tatyana bocharova @tanyaasmile thank you to each one of my amazing instagram testers @3hookproblem @crochetinglildommom tester @3hookproblem @create em all @crochetingkitten @joyful_knits @eniko_crochet tester @crochetinglildommom tester @create em all @ely_p _ sherman designer tatyana bocharova @tanyaasmile
